title: Meta adds iPhone Health app integration for Oculus Quest 2 workouts ahead of Apple headset reveal
content:
Meta has been working for over a year to integrate its Oculus VR workouts with Apple Health. Now, it’s finally going to happen as soon as next month.

more…

The post Meta adds iPhone Health app integration for Oculus Quest 2 workouts ahead of Apple headset reveal appeared first on 9to5Mac.
